overview: The Out follows Liam, a thirty-five-year-old recovering heroin addict, as he looks after his young daughter for the first time since being out of prison and getting clean. These 24 hours see Liam piecing together the fragments of his life after prison and his complicated journey to recovery
tagline: A recovering heroin addict looks after his young daughter for the 1st time since being out of prison and getting clean.
title: The Out
